201024322444197888.name: Unofficial Lord of the Rings Online Discord
201024322444197888.message: The official **{server}** welcomes {user}**#**{discriminator} and asks them to check out the <#201689445320228864> channel and notify `@Staff #server [#server...] [#other roles]` in this channel.

203325138601508866.name: LotRO-wiki
203325138601508866.message: Welcome to the Discord server for **{server}** {user} (- @{tag} -).  Please indicate if you are an editor of {server} by linking your username (- Example `!wuser Example` -).  If you're not an editor, please indicate you're a reader by typing `%roleme Reader`.  Thanks and welcome to the server!!!

201667758893563905.name: LotROstream
201667758893563905.message: {user}, Welcome to the **{server}** Discord server!  You can find out what show each host does by typing the (case sensitive) name of the host preceeded by a bang (!).  For example, to see what shows `@Cordovan` hosts, type `!Cordovan` in the <#201667758893563905> channel.

217263579080949760.name: IcyWitchplays
217263579080949760.message: {user}, Welcome to **{server}**!  Have a great time here :wink:!
